attributes.action: Bring in inventive new measures to get UK roads moving, such as turning left on a red light as per a give wway, and de classifying the lanes of a motorway which aren't used correctly anyhow.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
UK roads are very often grinding to gridlock. I believe a number of simple measures could help with traffic flow.

Allowing vehicles to turn left at a red traffic light, treating it as a "giveway" would help. This measure is already in place in the USA and works well.

Also, de classifying the lanes of UK motorways would assist hugely. Too many drivers don't even understand how to use the lanes, and the vast majority of the time when the roads are the slightest bit busy the outside lanes are rammed and the inside lane is empty.

These and other inventive yet common sense measures would greatly improve the usability of UK roads without undue cost or hassle.
